39443833.review: Surprisingly entertaining and FREE VR game, highly recommend it!

38787541.review:
Its a fun game to play.
im used to play VR Games but this is a unique twist. it allows you to be on the battlefield instead of watching it.
this way the experience is way better even better is the fact you have your own guns you can use and trow bombs at the enemy's

i really like this game!
However there are some minor flaws.
First of you can stand on the towers which is great but to select the top of the tower is not so great you have to aim really weird to get on top.
sadly there will be NO more updates coming for this game. it had potential but its worthless
i only recommend this game because its free and fun to play.
i do not recommend this game if you expect any improvement or new features

Only wish bomb towers were a bit cheaper (maybe 200) so I could afford to stay up in those towers and throw bombs in earlier waves - that's my favourite part!

36534405.review: God visuals and good gameplay. Good replay value. One of the bertter titles i have

36264174.review: Great game. I wish there would be more like this. Tower defence is great fun with VR.

36179838.review: This game is very good, especially for free. Very sorry to hear the devs won't be working on this more; it's a game that makes good use of VR, and keeps away the "tower defense monotony" by having you down there shooting next to your towers. Pick it up, give it a try.

36002304.review: This is one of my favourite VR games. It's a lot of fun and I highly recommend you give it a go!

36002290.review: A great free TD for VR with great mechanics that keep it interesting during the waves being able to shoot enemies yourself.

36001404.review: It was a good start to a VR TD. No longer supported, but still enjoyed trying it out.

35985422.review:
На данный момент это единственная игра, которая лично меня действительно затянула в VR (даже SuperHot подействовал не так)
По сути это классический Tower Defense, только ты находишься внутри, в гуще событий. Игра достаточно короткая, но я прошел ее полностью с огромным удовольствием, и с удовольствием бы увидел продолжение. Все остальное описывать не вижу особого смысла - игра бесплатная, попробуйте сами =) Всем любителям жанра Tower Defense рекоммендую.

35829503.review: You must get if you like tower defense games. Very cool little concept here. Rewarding and fun to play. Yes its tower defense, so it can get repetative, but I really enjoy it. Devs, keep building on this, you have a great game on your hands.

35741434.review: Great game, Only shame is the devs have moved on to other things, so no more content to come.

35729994.review: Don't be deceived by the screenshots here on Steam, the game is actually pretty good! :) A solid tower defense, where you also take the role of a defender and shoot the enemies along with your towers.

35722977.review:
I would love to see more like this. 
The controls are nice, height is good. Very well made experience.

Enjoyed this free game more already than some other games i have for VR i payed for.
Based on the quality it provides i would say it is worth 5 bucks compared to other games.

The game it self is a tower defense game. Between rounds you can build different defense buildings or upgrade mning speed for coins to have more the next round.
When you are in the level select level you have the chance to upgrade your gear (weapons + buildings) from not available to extra functionality of the gear.

35426738.review:
like most vr games it may not look good in the 2D video above but it is really well done. I expected alot less and almost didnt download it but it is a great game! I really enjoy shooting them in first person as well.

34439211.review:
TLDR: It's a really polished, great tower defense game that I couldn't put down once I tried it.

There's 3 different weapons, and 5 different towers. 
4 Playable maps with 4 different difficulties.
3 differnet kind of enemies.

This might not seem like much, but the game has progression in the form of batteries you can allocate to the weapons/towers you use / like. An example: You use the shotgun and would like to improve it, and you never use the gatling gun, so you disable the gatling gun in the hub world, by taking all of its batteries. Then you dump all the batteries in the shotgun, and this way you get a stronger shotgun at the cost of not being able to use the gatling gun. 

This progression system rewards exploration of options and it can drastically change the gameplay. I've played this free game more than a few other titles/experiences that I've payed cold hard cash for. Give it a spin.

One last thing I enjoyed: one of the weapons is a classic disc-golf-disc but with a twist. Once you've thrown the disc, you can pull the trigger and turn it into a sawblade, it's a lot of fun to use.

Can't wait to see what Bitbreak will do in the future, I for one would love an expanded tower defense game.

34021145.review: Worth the disk space. Good little VR experience!

33488754.review: Enjoyable and well presented little VR tower defense game. Not sure it's being developed anymore which is a shame but worth a download.

32555904.review:
I love tower defence games, and this is one of my favorites. I like being able to grab a gun and help my defences. I like the unique guns  and towers.

I don't like that the game isn't finished yet. I'm hoping they add an endless mode where the waves get tougher and tougher until you fail. I'd also like to see a leader board that kept track of  my top scores for each map. Of course we need to see more maps as well. Right now there are only 4. I'd like to be able to reset the game so others can play it from the start without the benifit of already won upgrades.

31348987.review: I have been playing In Your Face TD since the beta, and I gotta say, this is one of the best TDs I ever played in VR. I come from the hundreds of TD games from Starcraft BW and 2, and have always liked well made TDs. IYFTD is one of them. The 4 difficulties make it easy to learn quickly, but hard to master. The only thing I can wish for is more levels and an option for unlimited rounds for each level. Other than that, this is the best TD game availble now.

30988184.review:
Favorite tower defense style. I hate pre assigned positions for the towers. Let me build my own maze! 

Not a lot of content at the moment but has definite promise with the way it's going. I like the upgrade system.

30825157.review:
《咄咄逼人的塔防(In Your Face TD)》是一款太空塔防游戏。玩家需要在空间站中建造自己的防御和攻击系统，抵御敌人一波又一波的攻击。
　　游戏将塔防与射击元素相结合，玩家以第一人称视角进行游戏操作。不同于以往同类型的游戏只能站在远处布防，自己进行定点射击的操作，游戏可以在场景内自由移动，自主放置道具来定义怪物行进的路线。
　　游戏中的放置武器除了自动攻击的激光塔，还有需要玩家自己操作的炮塔，玩家可以站在炮塔上使用炮塔形成的炸弹攻击敌人。玩家自己本身也有三种武器可以切换操作，不过在炮塔上时无法切换，只能使用炮塔上的武器。
　　目前《咄咄逼人的塔防》在steam上的售价为30元。游戏挖法较为有趣，自由度也比较高，但是游戏内容偏少了一些，推荐喜欢塔防射击游戏的玩家体验。
http://www.83830.com/game/201703/161426225.shtml

30800589.review:
I really like this game! It's my favorite VR Tower Defense game on the Vive. I love being down on ground level in combat along side your towers with guns. I also love the resource system where you can see your bots gathering resources in real time kind of like Starcraft 2. Some towers allow interaction where you can directly enter them and control their function. Super cool idea! I also like the upgrade system for towers and weapons, using batteries you earn in the levels for the game.

Very fun game overall and I hope we see more TD games in VR in the future. 

My overview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lgo069YSMAI

30758490.review:
Wow this game really is great in VR!

Things I liked:
- Enemies have ragdoll.
- Game has great physics.
- You can stand on your turrets.
- You can create more workers to make money faster.
- Ride in a space ship. 
- Upgrading weapons.
- Guns are effective, responsive, and unique.

I had a lot of fun with this one! It has some nice mechanics! Cant wait to see whats added!

This game is fun whereas most other VR games so far may be interesting, but not actually very fun... at least in my experience. 

I played through all 3 levels on normal right away. I will prob wait for updates before playing more but this was FUN!

30734536.review:
I cried of excitement when I saw this game and bought it instantly! I completed the entire game(levels that is, not every unlock) and then played another round before I had to quit since it was 20:00 and I had to eat :p

It's quite similar to Sanctum. This game has so much potential! More tower types, enemy types, guns and level is probably on the horizon and I'm really excited for it!

30679169.review:
With previous games that shared keys for testing, I decided to add a review if I felt that the game is worthy or if it has a good potential in the EA phase.

Well, this game is clearly incomplete but I like what I found already and I can see the potential on the ideas.

From starters the interface to setup your resources is actually handled by the user in a good VR way. So far you get used to games in VR with flat menus for configuration, well this game surprised me with an original and interactive way to set up some game mechanichs. 

Later when starting the first level you will find a basic but fully playable Tower Defense style game with some VR twists.
 First of all you are in the path of the creeps...at the same level..and you have guns. 
So besides the normal turns of every TD game when you use different structures that you strategically decide which to buy and how to place them to defeat the different enemy rounds, you also participate by shooting them to avoid they to reach your base.

The idea is twist that it is actually fun (if you liked TD games of course).

Besides that the game is fully operative, at least for the 3 levels I played (long ones), I haven´t encountered stability errors or bugs so far. 
The assets used are clearly basic ones and the developers told me that for example, the skeletons are placeholders for better enemies to be developed.

So, besides not having many levels yet, the assets could be improved a lot. But, the game itself is already fully playable and I enjoyed it playing it like many TD I played...only with the VR twist of being there.
Here is a video showing gameplay before EA was released: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cSD24orq5fY

So, so far the game is incomplete, but really promising and enjoyable so far, I have to recommend it to you. 

I will also follow the development of the product and I really hope to see it evolving already with more content.
I will update this review over time to see how good it gets...or not. But so far I liked it for the potential and fun it has.

30671790.review: A game just released, that i got to Play a ton at the release party! The game brings me back to a time where WC3 TD was the thing to Play. This time, i take part in the action. Miniguns. Shotguns and basketballs. 10/10 would kill enemies with frisbees again!

39481705.review:
What a great little game! And its free!

So what is this game? Well, its of course a tower defence game.

So what makes this different than all of the other out there for VR? Well..

Its a tower defence game at it heart, but like many oither VR TD games, you are in first person the whole time, Not just when using abilities. But you don't have to constantly be in first person mode shooting everything else yourself. You are not the main weapon (unless you want to be) which is refreshing. Too many TD games i have tried in VR focus too much on you being the main tower. This games gives you the option, 

The method of giving you the option is that you can level up your towers back at homebase, OR you can level up your weapons, Or you can balance it and go for both.

The only negative i can see in this games so far (i have completed 2 of 4 maps so far) is that its a bit too easy. I'm a big TD fan, and found the highest difficulty (insane?) to be what i would class as "normal" difficulty in most other games.

But this does open the game up to newbies to the TD genre, and Newbies to VR also. So it kinda hits the mark for everyone.

It looks like the dev has left room to add new maps (which i would be happy to pay a small price for), and there appears to be a tower that is due to be released in the future (unless i simply have not unlocked it yet).

What i would like to see is even harder difficulty levels. And it would be cool if the buzz saw frisbees sliced through multiple targets, and maybe even returned like a boomerang.

All in all, its free! and its a damned fine game for what it is. I'm going to be keeping an eye on this dev, and can see myself coming back to this game over and over for my TD fix in VR. 

You should too!

39469399.review: I really hope you guys are using this as a testbed for a kick*** version of the same type of game.  Top notch, in a simple shell.  Well done.
